content.p: to shall be authority for entering into leases and the performance of the other acts and procedures authorized by to without reference to any other laws, or any restrictions or limitations contained therein, except as specifically provided in to If leases are entered into under to to the extent of any conflict or inconsistency between any provisions of to and any provisions of any other law, the provisions of to shall prevail and control, except that any governmental agency may use the provisions of any other law, not in conflict with the provisions of to to the extent convenient or necessary to carry out any power or authority, express or implied, granted by to to shall be liberally construed to effectuate its purpose.
